definition: Qaghiliq nahiyisi (Kargilik county) in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang
Qaghiliq nahiyisi (Kargilik county) in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

sentences.english: Before Mei filed her complaint about Hong to her husband, Hong disappeared suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 還沒等梅婧向葉城告狀，洪小玲卻突然失蹤了。

sentences.english: Then she came to Ye’s house as a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 便主動來葉城家當保姆。

sentences.english: Another month passed by and Ye finally came back home.
sentences.chinese: 又一個月過去了，葉城終於回來了。

sentences.english: Then Mei told her husband about the odd behaviors of Hong all these days.
sentences.chinese: 梅婧便向葉城講了洪小玲的一系列古怪的行爲。
